title: Mini Project
description: Apply core React concepts by building a small real-world application

intro.title: Your First Real App
intro.story: You know the concepts. Now itâ€™s time to build something useful.
intro.preview: State, events, effects, and structure come together.

concept.title: Project Overview
concept.content:
You will build a **Todo Manager App**.

Features:
- Add todos
- Mark complete
- Delete items
- Persist data using localStorage

concept2.title: What You Will Practice
concept2.content:
- Component structure
- useState for data
- useEffect for side effects
- Conditional rendering
- List rendering with keys

architecture.title: Component Breakdown
architecture.content:
App
- Header
- TodoInput
- TodoList
- TodoItem

Each component has a single responsibility.

positive.title: Base App Structure
positive.explanation: This is the root container of the project.

concept3.title: State Design
concept3.content:
Each todo item contains:
- id
- text
- completed (boolean)

State should represent the UI clearly.

negative.title: Common Project Mistake
negative.description: App re-renders but data is lost.
negative.question: Why is this wrong?

options.explanation: Local variables do not persist between renders.

negative.lesson: Application data must live in state.

task.title: Add Todo Feature
task.description: Create input and button to add new todos.
task.solution: Use useState for input value and update todos list

challenge.title: Persist Data
challenge.solution: Use useEffect with localStorage.getItem and setItem
